EmailTemplate.name: Case Escalation by Status
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Status} {!Case.RecordType} Case Escalation Alert
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.OwnerFirstName},
A {!Case.RecordType} case # {!Case.CaseNumber} current status is {!Case.Status} and has not had any activity in a few days. This case has now escalated and assigned to you for review.
Please navigate to the case record linked below to review the details.
Case Record Link: {!Case.Link}
Thank You! Case Escalations Team
